name: Autó bérlés
query: SELECT `user-rent`.`id`, `user-rent`.`userID`, CONCAT_WS(' ', `prefix_name`, `last_name`, `middle_name`, `first_name`,  `suffix_name`) AS `name`, `user-rent`.`carID`, `car`.`name` AS `carName`, `user-rent`.`rent`, `user-rent`.`start`, `user-rent`.`end`, `user-rent`.`discount`, `user-rent`.`valid` FROM `user-rent` INNER JOIN `user` ON `user-rent`.`userID` = `user`.`id` INNER JOIN `car` ON `user-rent`.`carID` = `car`.`id` ORDER BY `user-rent`.`id`
label: Azonosító
